rpgonline.world.editor

Class WorldEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlledInputReciever, ControllerListener, InputListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, GameState, BaseScaleState

    public class WorldEditor
extends WorldState
    A class that allows for the editing of game worlds.
    Author:
    Tomas
